attributes.action: Get Dedicated Babyloss Facilities into Maternity Hospitals. No More Labour Ward!
attributes.background: I would Like the Government to Create Babyloss Facilities away from The Labour Ward/ Maternity Unit. To date women have to deliver their sleeping babies in the labour ward, This is a ward that is dedicated to Live babies! This treatment is absolutely inhumane, Barbaric and Traumatizing for Women.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual trusts and hospitals.  We could accept a petition calling for the Government to increase NHS funding to enable hospitals to take this action.
